name: MySpace - Updated Home Rearranged
description:
Just a work in progress at the moment, rearranging the new MySpace homepage and getting rid of the ads throughout the site. The homepage isn't the only thing tweaked, but many elements throughout the entire site.

Works as of 09/25/08.

*Scrolling friend updates, bulletins, and top friends! (saves a ton of room)
*Ad removal from entire site
*Spam removal from profiles sites
*Some fake profile schemes disabled
*Spam mass comment removal
*Shock-site protection :)
*MySpaceTV Rearranging
*New Pictures are highlighted inside albums
*Enlarged textboxes throughout the site
*Profile Edit page now much cleaner, more editing space.
*Removal of a lot of new banner ads
*The ability to hopefully always see somone's top friends
*Automatically shortens profile pics that are very tall (example; friend #10)
